summary:
Add new stand alone high quality retexture male character to the game base of movie hercules
starring Dwayne johnson
descriptionHtml:
[center]HERCULES

add new stand alone high quality retexture male character to the game base of movie hercules
starring Dwayne johnson

Name : Hercules

Class : Warrior one handed

Level : 50 [overpower for low level player]

Perks : all one handed and light armor perks tree

Weapon : Rusted mace [unplayable]

Body type : Default

Weight : 90

Marriable : Yes

Location : whiterun Jorrvaskr

Required : Skyrim.esm

Installation :
Simply use Nexus Mod Manager

Uninstallation :
Simply remove from Nexus Mod Manager

Credit :

BETHESDA
True Eyes by JimtownIrish
Brows by Hvergelmir
Beards by Hvergelmir

Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for downloading"[/center]
author: Fachry
